name: Gib!
description:
A game I made about a decapitated Quake head trying to find its way home. The game runs in-browser. I recommend chrome on a reasonably powered computer with a physical keyboard.

Controls:

  • D - right
  • A - left
  • W - jump
  • Space - remove text

Assets not my own. Created using Construct. When you win, the text is supposed to say "You Win!" and not just "You". It's a weird bug that comes with putting the game in an iframe I guess? The game can be seen in its original form here.
